Articles.Content:
Haven't seen any Devnotes since the 27th of April and now we are a few weeks into May. I expected a gap of a week or so, have we stopped getting Devnotes now? 

Did I miss the announcement about how long the holiday was?

I thought they said 2 weeks. I would expect a squeak about something, even a "hi we're back!" message at least a week after returning. 

Then again, who knows...
Wondering the same as the OP... is the dev holiday being extended, or were they all disposed of in distant locations while one person ran off with the company money?
Remember 1.0? I don't expect anything from them for at least a couple of months.

Kasper tweeted this last Friday:

So basically, expect the devs to return next Monday.
I'm glad they're taking a break. I would honestly feel guilty asking them for anything after they've been working full steam for so long.

I never saw an announcement of how long it was, people just kept saying two weeks.  I would guess if they haven't posted yet (being Wednesday) it must have been 3 weeks.  They'll get back when they get back, in the meantime, 1.0.5 is a perfectly fine playable version so just have patience (I know, it's hard to do after tasting 1.1)

Edited May 18, 2016 by Alshain
I'm just worried that if the devnotes were put off for a month, that any patches are a long way off.

1 minute ago, Violent Jeb said:

I'm just worried that if the devnotes were put off for a month, that any patches are a long way off.

I don't think that a patch is that far off once they're back.

Esp since several of them have been a bit crafty and twiddled/updated their personal mods while on vacation from Squad.
Devnotes are gone forever! Or until Squad gets back from vacation. Whichever comes first.
